short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the reviews for professors from Rate My Professors on the class registration page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension seamlessly displays professor ratings from Rate My Professors under their names on the class registration pages for several universities. We cut down the time you spend looking up professors by providing the average review rating directly on the class registration page along with a direct link to the professor's Rate My Professors page.
